Module utcn.ordermanagement
Package utcn.ordermanagement.data_access.repository

Class Query

java.lang.Object
utcn.ordermanagement.data_access.repository.Query
public class Query extends Object
This class acts as a query builder for database operations

      Parameters:

    • where

      public Query where(String condition, Object... parameters)
      Lets the builder know to create a WHERE clause
      Parameters:
      condition - Represents the full WHERE condition
      parameters - A variadic array of objects, representing the values from the WHERE clause
      Returns:
      The created Query object from before

      Parameters:

    • executeUpdate

      public int executeUpdate() throws SQLException
      Acts as the end for a insertInto, update, delete query
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when executing the sql statement

    • toList

      public <Model> List<Model> toList(Class<Model> clazz) throws SQLException
      Acts as an end of a Query
      Type Parameters:
      Model - The generic type
      Parameters:
      clazz - A class used to map the result
      Returns:
      A list containing the result of the query
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the query

      Parameters:
